PAST_HOUR_COMMENT_COUNT: In the past hour you've had <% if(replyCount > 1) { %>some replies<% } else { %>a reply<% } %> to your<% if(commentsSummary.length > 1) {%> comments<% } else { %> comment<% } %>.
